errors.cause: Invalid domain, client ID, or secret

solutions.code:
AUTH0_DOMAIN=your-tenant.auth0.com
AUTH0_CLIENT_ID=your-client-id
AUTH0_CLIENT_SECRET=your-secret

# Auth0 Dashboard > Applications > Your App
# Copy Domain, Client ID, Client Secret

errors.cause: Callback URL not in allowed list

solutions.code:
# Auth0 Dashboard > Applications > Your App > Settings
# Allowed Callback URLs: http://localhost:3000/callback
# Allowed Logout URLs: http://localhost:3000
# Allowed Web Origins: http://localhost:3000

# Allowed Callback URLs (comma-separated):
http://localhost:3000/callback, https://myapp.com/callback

# Auth0 Dashboard > Authentication > Social
# Enable Google, Facebook, etc.
# Configure client ID and secret from provider

# Auth0 Dashboard > Applications > Your App > Connections
# Enable the social connections for this app

# Auth0 Dashboard > Logs
# Filter by 'Failed Login' or 'Failed Exchange'

# Auth0 Dashboard > Actions > Library > Your Action
# Use 'Test' tab with sample event

# Free: 1000 Monthly Active Users, limited API calls
# Check current usage in Auth0 Dashboard

# Auth0 Dashboard > Security > Multi-factor Auth
# Enable factors: SMS, Authenticator App, etc.

# Set MFA policy per application:
# Auth0 Dashboard > Applications > Your App > Settings > Advanced
# Require MFA: Always, For New Devices, Never

# Auth0 Dashboard > Applications > Your App > Settings
# Allowed Web Origins: http://localhost:3000

# For development, use wildcard (not recommended for production):
# Allowed Web Origins: http://localhost:*
